DOC.brief_summary: A study which assesses the physician's comfort level and satisfaction when using the e2TM Collector compared to the Spatula/SytoBrush technique.
DOC.brief_title: Physician's Comfort Level and Satisfaction Study With The e2TM Collector Compared to the Spatula/CytoBrush Technique
DOC.criteria: Every Physician who will participate in the two CytoCore prospective studies assessing the safety and efficacy of the e2TM Collector Each physician will have used the Collector 15 25 times Each physician will have signed the Consent form prior to using the Collector for the first time. None (commensurate with the above inclusion conditions.)
